verses.roman:
'eka' aṅga sādhe, keha sādhe 'bahu' aṅga
'niṣṭhā' haile upajaya premera taraṅga

synonyms: eka—one; aṅga—portion; sādhe—executes; keha—someone; sādhe—executes; bahu—many; aṅga—portions; niṣṭhā—firm faith; haile—if there is; upa-jaya—awaken; premera—of love of Godhead; taraṅga—the waves.
translation: "When one is firmly fixed in devotional service, whether he executes one or many processes of devotional service, the waves of love of Godhead will awaken.

purport.content: The processes of devotional service are śravaṇaṁ kīrtanaṁ viṣṇoḥ smaraṇaṁ pāda-sevanam arcanaṁ vandanaṁ dāsyaṁ sakhyam ātma-nivedanam.
